sn9.5:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9.5:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ānando ativelaṃ gihisaññattibahulo viharati.
sn9.5:4.3: Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmato ānandassa anukampikā atthakāmā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ saṃvejetukāmā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
sn9.5:5.3: Jhāya gotama mā pamādo,
sn9.5:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.
